changelogs.changelog: AutoMod is now significantly faster
ModBot will now map PluralKit webhook messages to the account that sent them for AutoMod. Also renamed `m: stats` to `m: about`
`m: lockdown` will no longer throw an error if the channel is already locked
Gave more time to name alertchannel when setting one up
Added even better error messages for when ModBot doesn't have administrator permissions
ModBot permissions errors are now way more helpful
`m: poll` now works with anon channels
AutoMod now works correctly with pluralkit
Log now includes tag of user who's message was removed
Fixed profile picture not appearing in AutoMod log
Raised time limit when setting up trigger
AutoMod now works even if ModBot doesn't have admin permissions
Fixed permissions on AutoMod log channel
Triggers can no longer be added with AutoMod disabled
Added ability to use flags in AutoMod regex triggers

Added brand new automod system! AutoMod includes punishment logging, powerful rule support with regex, and can automatically mute users and delete messages when they hit an automod trigger. It's highly customizable
Changed `m: color` font size to align with linux font differences
Fixed bug in purge command permission checking caused by previous update
`m: purge` now uses channel permissions instead of server-wide permissions
Added `m: color` command to get information about a color
Changelog will now show all new changes even if modbot isn't updated on every release
